title: 2/BD, Breakfast bars available, Views
posting_body: Whether you invite friends over for a day at the pool or to show off your grill-master skills in the barbecue pavilion, Azures Apartment Homes embraces laid-back luxury and the modern comforts of today.
Our spacious apartment homes are outfitted with luxe details from wood-style flooring to stone countertops.
Plus, residents enjoy an array of indoor and outdoor amenities including a gym and fully equipped resident social lounge.
-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity
-Wood-style plank flooring in kitchen and living areas                                                                                        Featured amenity

-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
